media:group.media:title: The Surprising History of Diamonds
media:group.media:description:
Diamonds were once believed to be precious gems obtainable in only one place on Earth, guarded by supernatural creatures and possessing magical qualities. For centuries, they were prized by elites from around the world, and remain prized to this day. What is their story? In this video, we find out.
Find us here too! Patreon: www.Patreon.com/Fireoflearning Lucinox – Our Science Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCM2dfLR3BR0CHuePEDtxAZw

media:group.media:title: The Kelly-Hopkinsville Encounter | Documentary
media:group.media:description:
One night in August of 1955, a group of 11 people burst into a local police station in rural Kentucky, claiming they had been harassed by strange creatures, impervious to bullets, who had been standing directly outside of their house for hours, looking inside. The investigation that took place in the subsequent days and months revealed this case (which, though the creatures described were silver, gave rise to the term "little green men") to be one of the strangest purported encounters with extraterrestrials ever recorded. In this video, we analyze this incident.
This video was originally uploaded to Lucinox in February of 2022. However, I decided in October of 2022 to focus the Campfire series, of which this video is a part, on Fire of Learning exclusively.
Find us here too! Patreon: www.Patreon.com/Fireoflearning Lucinox – Our Science Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCM2dfLR3BR0CHuePEDtxAZw

entry.title: Skinwalker Ranch - The Full Story | Documentary

media:group.media:title: Skinwalker Ranch - The Full Story | Documentary
media:group.media:description:
A ranch in Utah has, ever since it was first reported on in 1996, been regarded as one of the most significant hotspots of paranormal activity in the entire world. Moreover, it is also one of the few to be thoroughly investigated by professional teams of researchers. What really happened here? In this video, we will find out.

entry.title: The Full History of Christmas - Documentary

media:group.media:title: The Full History of Christmas - Documentary
media:group.media:description:
In this video, we take a look at origins of the world's most popular holiday, from the first Christmas, to the raucous Medieval Christmases, to the development of the modern holiday and its major traditions, and more.
Find us here too! Patreon: www.Patreon.com/Fireoflearning Lucinox – Our Science Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCM2dfLR3BR0CHuePEDtxAZw Instagram: @Fire_of_Learning
